axis_supply.supply_status: Adequate for defensive operations, strained for offensive operations. After intense Q2 1941 battles (Battleaxe), corps consolidating and rebuilding for autumn operations. Fuel and ammunition prioritized over other supplies.
axis_supply.notes: Supply lines from Tripoli ~1000km. Tobruk siege diverts resources. Benghazi port limited capacity. Water critical constraint in desert summer.

allied_supply.supply_status: Transitional - 90% of allotted transport and 90% of arms/equipment by end of June 1941. Division not yet considered ready for operations at start of Q3. Vehicles mostly carried over from East Africa campaign showing wear. Re-equipment ongoing through August-September. Supply situation improving as desert supply chains established from Egyptian depots.
